text: @FredTJoseph @gofundme Hi, disabled 27 year old that lives with her disabled 52 year old mother/caregiver. We can't go to the store because we are experiencing symptoms of Covid-19 and no transportation to get takeout. We need money to buy food offline and have it delivered. https://t.co/DXojOawVOU
